member.summary: Defines a generic game system.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.IGameSystem.Initialize
member.summary: This method is called when the component is added to the game.
member.remarks: This method can be used for tasks like querying for services the component needs and setting up non-graphics resources.

member.summary: An interface that is called by .

member.summary: Occurs when the property changes.

member.value: true if update is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:SharpDX.Toolkit.IUpdateable.UpdateOrder
member.summary: Gets the update order relative to other game components. Lower values are updated first.

member.name: T:SharpDX.Toolkit.IDrawable
member.summary: An interface for a drawable game component that is called by the class.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.IDrawable.BeginDraw
member.summary: Starts the drawing of a frame. This method is followed by calls to Draw and EndDraw.
member.returns: true if Draw should occur, false otherwise

member.summary: Draws this instance.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.IDrawable.EndDraw
member.summary: Ends the drawing of a frame. This method is preceded by calls to Draw and BeginDraw.

member.name: E:SharpDX.Toolkit.IDrawable.VisibleChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the property changes.

member.name: P:SharpDX.Toolkit.IDrawable.Visible
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the method should be called by .

member.name: P:SharpDX.Toolkit.IDrawable.DrawOrder
member.summary: Gets the draw order relative to other objects. objects with a lower value are drawn first.

member.name: T:SharpDX.Toolkit.SharpDXElement
member.summary: An framework element that supports rendering D3D11 scene.

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.SharpDXElement.ReceiveResizeFromGameProperty
member.summary: Indicates whether the size of this should be affected by the Game settings. Default is false.

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.SharpDXElement.SendResizeToGameProperty
member.summary: Indicates whether the event will cause size changes in the bound class. Default is false.

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.SharpDXElement.SendResizeDelayProperty
member.summary: Indicates the time delay before the resize event will be propagated to the bound Game class which will cause its backbuffer resize. Default is 1 second.

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.SharpDXElement.LowPriorityRenderingProperty
member.summary: Indicates whether the rendering should be done in the priority. This may cause loss of FPS, but will not interfere with the input processing. Default is false.

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.SharpDXElement.GameProperty
member.summary: Binds a Game object to use this element as rendering surface.
member.remarks: Internally uses depending whether . This property is intended to be used only in WPF MVVM scenarios, do not use it if you use the above methods directly.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of class.

member.name: T:SharpDX.Toolkit.EffectCompilerSystem
member.summary: Allows to dynamically recompile Effects at runtime when original source code changed, without having to recompile the application. See remarks.
member.remarks: The effect must have been compiled with tkfxc and option /Re. This features is only available from Windows Desktop and doesn't work on other platforms.

member.summary: Occurs when a compilation ended for an effect.

member.summary: Occurs when a compilation error occurred for an effect.

member.summary: Occurs when a compilation started for an effect.

member.name: T:SharpDX.Toolkit.GameContext
member.summary: Contains context used to render the game (Control for WinForm, a DrawingSurface for WP8...etc.).
A to use for rendering to an existing WinForm .

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.GameContext.ContextType
member.summary: The context type of this instance.

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.GameContext.Control
member.summary: The native control used.

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.GameContext.RequestedWidth
member.summary: The requested width.

member.name: F:SharpDX.Toolkit.GameContext.RequestedHeight
member.summary: The requested height.

member.name: M:SharpDX.Toolkit.GameContext.#ctor(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The control, platform dependent. See remarks for supported controls.
member.exception: Control is not supported. Must inherit from System.Windows.Forms.Control (WinForm) or System.Windows.Controls.Border (WPF hosting WinForm) or SharpDX.Toolkit.SharpDXElement (WPF)
member.remarks:
On Windows Desktop, the Toolkit supports the following controls:
WinForm control inheriting
WPF control inheriting for Hwnd hosting
WPF D3DImage control

member.name: P:SharpDX.Toolkit.GameContext.UseApplicationDoEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the render loop should use the default instead of a custom window message loop lightweight for GC. Default is false
member.value: true if use the default ; otherwise, false.
